Semua Kepala Daerah Akan Dikumpulkan untuk Samakan Visi dengan Presiden
03 Nov 2019, 15:27 by Muhammad Ashari
JAKARTA, (PR).- Pemerintah pusat akan konsolidasikan pemerintah daerah supaya bisa mengarahkan programnya sesuai dengan visi-misi presiden. Konsolidasi itu akan dilakukan pada November ini.
Menteri Dalam Negeri, Tito Karnavian mengatakan bahwa seluruh jajaran pemerintah daerah perlu memahami visi-misi Presiden Joko Widodo dan Wapres KH Ma’ruf Amin yang dituangkan dalam Program Prioritas Nasional. Untuk penyamaan persepsi dan dalam rangka harmonisasi tersebut, ia akan mengundang seluruh daerah dan pejabat terkait untuk menyamakan persepsi.
“Supaya visi ini sama semua, saya sudah sampaikan kepada Bapak Presiden, pada pertengahan November 2019 seluruh kepala daerah akan kami undang, mulai dari gubernur, bupati/walikota bersama Kapolda, Kajati, Kajari, Pangdam, Dandim,” kata Tito akhir pekan kemarin.
Penyamaan persepsi dan sinkronisasi tersebut dikatakannya perlu dilakukan agar program pembangunan di pemerintah daerah berlandaskan pada Program Prioritas Nasional. Selain itu, setiap program disesuaikan dengan kebutuhan dan karakteristik daerah masing-masing.
Menurutnya, Jokowi telah mengarahkan supaya pemerintah daerah harus menyesuaikan agar setiap program bisa menyentuh pembangunan SDM dan penciptaan lapangan kerja.
Untuk pembangunan SDM, setiap program perlu diarahkan kepada bidang kesehatan, pendidikan dan stunting. “Kedua adalah membangun lapangan kerja, investasi, kemudahan membuka usaha swasta dalam berinvestasi di daerah masing-masing,” ujarnya.
Tito menambahkan, nantinya dalam pertemuan, presiden akan memperjelas program prioritas nasional yang telah dicanangkan. Sementara para Menko dan menteri terkait juga akan menjabarkan serta mempertajam program-program prioritas nasional sesuai visi-misi presiden tersebut.
“Sehingga seluruh kepala daerah paham visi-misinya apa, sehingga bisa masuk dalam rancangan APBD, di samping kebutuhan khas daerahnya masing-masing,” katanya.***

All Regional Heads Will Be Gathered to Equate Vision with President
Nov 03 2019, 15:27 by Muhammad Ashari
JAKARTA, (PR) .- The central government will consolidate regional governments so that they can direct their programs in accordance with the president's vision and mission. Consolidation will be carried out this November.
The Minister of Home Affairs, Tito Karnavian said that all levels of local government need to understand the vision and mission of President Joko Widodo and Vice President KH Ma'ruf Amin as outlined in the National Priority Program. To unify perception and in the context of harmonization, he will invite all regions and related officials to equalize perception.
"In order for this vision to be the same, I have conveyed to the President, in mid-November 2019 we will invite all regional heads, starting from the governor, regent / mayor together with the Kapolda, Kajati, Kajari, Pangdam, Dandim," Tito said last weekend.
The said perception and synchronization needs to be done so that development programs in local governments are based on the National Priority Program. In addition, each program is tailored to the needs and characteristics of their respective regions.
According to him, Jokowi has directed that local governments must adjust so that each program can touch on human resource development and job creation.
For human resource development, each program needs to be directed to the fields of health, education and stunting. "Second is to build employment, investment, ease of opening a private business in investing in their respective regions," he said.
Tito added, later in the meeting, the president would clarify the national priority program that had been announced. While the Coordinating Ministers and related ministers will also describe and sharpen national priority programs according to the president's vision and mission.
"So that all regional heads understand what their vision and mission is, so that they can be included in the APBD design, in addition to the specific needs of their respective regions," he said. ***
